en.explanation: '고개숙여인사하다' means 'bow head in greeting' in English.

examples.master: Understanding the cultural context of "고개숙여인사하다" makes communication more natural.

formal: It is bow head in greeting.
There is bow head in greeting.
casual: bow head in greeting, you know.
